product_full_name: Supercozy balloon sleeve mockneck top in TENCEL™ lyocell
description: this easy turtleneck pullover with pretty puff sleeves is made of supersoft tencel™ lyocell, a fiber that's produced from wood pulp sourced from sustainably managed and certified forests (meaning not ancient or endangered!) then put through a closed-loop production process that recycles water and solvents. the result is a soft, stretchy fabric—somewhere between a heavy tee and a light sweater—that's naturally soft and breathable.

description: when it comes to quality and color, no one does cashmere quite like we do. our best-selling and crazy-soft sweaters are the result of over 30 years of expertise, obsessing over fit, durability and handfeel. and all our vibrant, custom-developed hues come straight from our in-house color library. this season, we took the silhouette of our best-selling supersoft mockneck sweater and made it in our famous everyday cashmere. the curved hem hits low on the back, with thick ribbing detail for a luxurious finish. to honor the future of this fiber, we're proud to join the sustainable fibre alliance (sfa), an international nonprofit working to create a more sustainable cashmere supply chain. as the first u.s. member of the sfa, we're supporting its efforts to ensure animal welfare, advocate for herding communities, restore grasslands and reduce cashmere's environmental footprint. learn more about this special organization at sustainablefibre.org.

product_full_name: Point Sur silk tunic in block print
description: point sur specializes in vintage-inspired jeans with modern details—it's the kind of cool that never goes out of style. like this pretty silk tunic, for example. we crafted it in a block print pattern we designed in-house, and added elegant details like exaggerated cuffs and covered buttons, as well as a high-low hem that's perfect for front-tucks. we recommend pairing it with white denim for summer nights out.

the ultimate tee for tucking into high-rise denim or pants with a flattering slim fit, henley neckline and throwback-style half sleeves. plus, a touch of stretch for a super-flattering finish.

point sur is inspired by our original collection of la-made denim and it's the kind of cool that never goes out of style. these wide leg pants, for instance, are a by-popular-demand update to our bestselling wide leg crop. with a full length silhouette, they have the same wide leg that's not too wide, but with a longer inseam for a seasonless touch.
work out or hang out in these shapely high-waist leggings styled with contrasting texture and ribbed hems.
a high waistband helps flatter your figure in moisture-wicking leggings updated in a cropped length.

description: when it comes to quality and color, no one does cashmere quite like we do. and while winters can be rough, this cozy ribbed scarf is very, very soft. to honor the future of this fiber, we're proud to join the sustainable fibre alliance (sfa), an international nonprofit working to create a more sustainable cashmere supply chain. as the first u.s. member, we're supporting its efforts to ensure animal welfare, advocate for herding communities, restore grasslands and reduce cashmere's environmental footprint. learn more at sustainablefibre.org.

description: when it comes to quality and color, no one does cashmere quite like we do. our best-selling and crazy-soft sweaters are the result of over 30 years of expertise, obsessing over fit, durability and handfeel. this season we dreamed up the coziest thing we could think of—cashmere joggers—that match back to our new (equally soft) cashmere hoodie. to honor the future of this fiber, we're proud to join the sustainable fibre alliance (sfa), an international nonprofit working to create a more sustainable cashmere supply chain. as the first u.s. member, we're supporting its efforts to ensure animal welfare, advocate for herding communities, restore grasslands and reduce cashmere's environmental footprint. learn more at sustainablefibre.org.

product_full_name: Collection fluted sheath dress in Ratti® climbing floral jacquard
description: luxe doesn't even begin to describe this perfect party dress. we hand-picked the stunning floral print from the como-based archives of italy's ratti print house (home to some of the world's most amazing prints since 1945), and weaved the jacquard fabric so that both the cut of the dress and its print feel fully in sync. did we mention that this classic sheath silhouette (with a panel of sheer black fabric and fluted hem) never goes out of style?

what can we say? the puff shoulder is our bread and butter. this reissue is updated in jet-black brushed-back terry, which feels just like it sounds: soft and cozy. it puffs up gently at the shoulders (the ruffle embellishments give it an extra feminine feel) and fits like your favorite college sweatshirt (roomy and relaxed), but with a look that’s more in line with your best-loved blouse (note the pleated-back detail). in other words, it’s a decidedly pulled-together pullover you’ll reach for constantly.75% polyamide, 25% elastanemachine wash warm on gentle cycle, lay flat to drymade in usameasurements (from size s): 18.75" chest, 24.74" sleeve length, 22.25" body length, 20.25" waistmodel is 5’9.5" with 33" bust, 25" waist, 33.5" hips and wearing a size xs

description: Breast Cancer Awareness Hunter
details:
Join Rails in the fight against breast cancer! For each exclusive Hunter “Warrior Pink” shirt sold, Rails will donate its net profits to benefit Susan G. Komen*.
DETAILS |The classic RAILS long sleeve plaid button-down shirt. Made from our signature, ultra soft rayon fabric featuring a loose twill weave. This style is a year-round comfort classic and is offered in a wide variety of colors. Single layer with one chest pocket.100% Rayon. Loose weave.Imported.
CARE | Hand Wash Cold. Hang Dry. No Bleach.
FIT | Recommend ordering true to size.  Body length: 26 7/8" (Measured from Small)
*For each exclusive Hunter shirt sold, RAILS has donated a minimum of $35 to Susan G. Komen® to help in the fight against breast cancer. Donation to occur in 2019-2020 regardless of consumer purchase.

description: what you'll see when you put these jean shorts on: their bum-enhancing superpowers and waist-whittling high rise.
d'orsay pumps are a shoe closet staple, so a pair in stylish faux-snakeskin are an absolute must-have.

since suede is the ultimate transitional finish, we'll be wearing these with tights now, and on their own when spring (finally!) arrives. after all, these classic, pointed-toe flats sharpen up and polish off any outfit.

first introduced more than 35 years ago as a tennis sneaker, the nike killshot 2 is your go-anywhere, do-everything shoe for coffee runs, nights out and everywhere in between. now the best-selling cult-favorite retro sneaker is back in the original suede and leather fabrication. the super-versatile, low-profile design looks good with everything from denim to chinos to suits. hope your other sneakers like sitting in the closet, because you'll be wearing these every day. please note that the color of the gum sole may vary.

description: our silk-chiffon ashlynn blouse is updated this season with a washed daisy print, making it perfect for breezy days ahead. billowy sleeves and a relaxed fit add to its romantic yet laidback sensibility. we love pairing the airy blouse with high-rise pants and platform sandals for a polished look. available in blue multi and red multi. available in sizes 00-24.

the definition of timeless, this stunning shearling coat is a wardrobe investment you'll style with all the classics. featuring double-breasted details, front pockets, and roll-up sleeves, it's a piece you'll keep coming back to.

we took our signature trench coat and made a few tweaks—a higher waist, shorter hem, and navy underfelt collar meant for popping—to bring it into 2018 (and beyond!). but don't worry, the classic details you already love are still there.

a nostalgic silhouette with modern updates. this suede blouse features smart, subtle details like a sharply-pointed collar and contrast stitching. wear with everything from flared denim to a leather skirt.
versatile and sleek, these classic crop trousers are designed in a flattering slim fit. wears yours with everything from silk blouses to your favorite knits.

product_full_name: Tiered sleeveless maxi dress in Ratti® scarf paisley
description: with a gorgeous print from italy's ratti print house (home to some of the world's most amazing motifs since 1945), this tiered dress will be a total showstopper at any occasion.
a versatile layer with enduring elegance. this wool and cashmere camel-colored coat featuring pockets and a removable belt is the ideal piece to toss over everything before heading out the door.
better butts. this is a high rise, rigid jean with a zipper fly and cigarette leg. the julia crop is fitted throughout the hip and butt with an easy fitting, cropped leg.

pintuck detailing gives this classic button-down blouse a formal feel. featuring a collarless neckline, concealed buttons, and gently ballooned sleeves, it’s a sleek and modern essential to pair with jeans, pants, and skirts.

product_full_name: Gingham button-front midi dress with ruffle hem in soft rayon
description: the one thing that every closet needs: a classic soft rayon sundress with pretty tie straps, a true button-front and pockets (!). but this summery style has so much more, like a fun gingham print, a ruffle hem and a pretty tea length.

our victorian-inspired beth top features a delicate ditsy floral and a relaxed fit. bracelet-length sleeves and ruffle trims add to its romantic, breezy style. pair with jeans and heeled sandals for a versatile look that can be worn day to night. available in white multi.
leather buttons and a standing collar add even more charm to this cozy balloon sleeve cardigan. details we love: the classic cable knit design and ribbed hems.
layer up. this is a double breasted coat with a faux fur shawl collar and detachable belt. the somerset is midi length and has side pockets.
voluminous sleeves put a feminine spin on this classic denim jacket. with pleated detailing and gold hardware, style yours with everything from jeans to dresses.

let it be known, once you're wrapped up in our famously plush teddy sherpa, you may never want to take it off. our coziest topcoat comes in a chilled-out array of colors and features a notch collar, easy snap closure and of course, pockets. bonus: it's machine washable!
sexy silky. this is an a-line mini skirt with a center back zipper. the benson pairs well with the hailee top.
